section.p: You find the city is in turmoil. A rebel group, loyal to the old king, led an uprising against the army. Vicious fighting ensued and the streets ran with blood before the rebellion was brutally put down. Unfortunately, much damage was done during the battle. If you own a town house in Yellowport it has been looted - any possessions you may have cached there have gone. Make a note of this paragraph number, turn to 300, cross off anything you had stored there, and return here to read on.
